articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: Spain records first death from monkeypox - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Experts suspect that monkeypox outbreaks in Europe and North America were ignited by sex at two raves in Belgium and Spain.
articles.content:
Spain on Friday reported the death of a person from monkeypox, which Spanish media said was a first for the European nation.

articles.title: Spain, Brazil report first monkeypox deaths outside Africa - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: About 70 percent of cases in the outbreak that began in May have been found in Europe and 25 percent in the Americas.
articles.content:
